content:
Can you make parsable format of this answer There are several global payment gateways that are known for their high credibility and reliability. Here are some of the most popular options:

PayPal - PayPal is one of the most widely used payment gateways globally. It offers a secure and easy-to-use platform for online payments.
Stripe - Stripe is a popular payment gateway that offers fast and reliable payment processing. It is known for its flexibility and scalability, making it a popular choice for businesses of all sizes.
Authorize.Net - Authorize.Net is a trusted payment gateway that offers a range of payment options, including credit and debit cards, e-checks, and digital payment methods.
Amazon Pay - Amazon Pay is a payment gateway that allows customers to use their Amazon accounts to make payments online. It offers a fast and easy payment process, making it a popular choice for online retailers.
Skrill - Skrill is a global payment gateway that offers secure and easy payment processing. It is widely used in the online gaming and gambling industries, as well as in e-commerce.
All of these payment gateways have a strong reputation for reliability and security, and are widely trusted by businesses and consumers alike.
